info.name: Forecast.io - hide map
info.description: Hides the large globe/map on the Forecast.io weather forecast page. This lets you see much more of the page below without scrolling, such as the detailed forecast for today.
info.additionalInfo: In the screenshot, Adblock Plus is also enabled. Without it, an ad will appear below the big weather summary. This goes well with my user script Forecast.io – auto-show today’s outlook, which helps you make use of the added vertical space by automatically expanding the detailed forecast for today.
